items.sentence: She couldn\'t convince him to ask for a loan.
She didn\'t run fast enough to catch the bus.
You\'re supposed to be relaxing, aren\'t you?
You\'re talking about Tom again, aren\'t you?
You\'re the one who invited Tom, aren\'t you?
You\'re the only one who thinks that\'s true.
You\'re the only one with a key, aren\'t you?
The movie wasn\'t as interesting as the book.
Tom is always trying to boss everyone around.
Tom is careful about what he eats and drinks.
Tom is eating breakfast alone in the kitchen.
Tom is likely to be hungry when he gets home.
Tom is looking for someone who speaks French.
Tom didn\'t consider Mary\'s feelings at all.
Tom was the one who suggested that I do that.
Tom was the one who taught me how to do that.
Tom was the one who told me where Mary lived.
I think Tom drank out of my glass by mistake.
I think Tom has been to Boston at least once.
How old were you when your father was killed?
